ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then they will roast in the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then they will indeed burn in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then they shall enter Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will suffer the heat of fire
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then indeed they have to enter hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then verily, they will indeed enter the burning flame of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then most surely they shall enter the burning fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then they shall roast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then lo! they verily will burn in hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then they shall enter the Fire of Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then verily they will be roasted into the Scorch.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Further, they will enter the Fire of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, verily they will indeed enter and taste the burning flame of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then they shall roast in Hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then they will roast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:16] Then they will be exposed to Hell-fire, [then] they will enter the scorching Fire;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then lo! they verily will burn in hell) then they will enter the Fire,
